channel.title: Help Please Main Class Error
channel.description: hey my old acc is either gone or im an idiot and forgot pass so i created this one.. anyways.. im at my dads house and he has an older and much slower computer than what i have at my moms. here is the specs: [code]Microsoft Windows Xp Home Edition Version 2002 Service Pack 3 eMachines T2893 Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU 2.66GHz 2.67GHz, 504MB of RAM[/code] anyways im having a problem when i run all of the 508-525 clients and some of the 317 clients it says main class erorr yadada anyways take a look..[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] anyways in most cases with **most** clients this happens. i need idea please. please help me. ive tried reinstalling my java, clearing all caches and reinstalling the clients. thats about all i know so please help.

item.title: Help Please Main Class Error
item.dc:creator: @matts_sexy matts sexy
item.description:
@matts_sexy wrote:

hey my old acc is either gone or im an idiot and forgot pass so i created this one… anyways… im at my dads house and he has an older and much slower computer than what i have at my moms.
here is the specs:

Microsoft Windows Xp Home Edition Version 2002 Service Pack 3 eMachines T2893 Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU 2.66GHz 2.67GHz, 504MB of RAM
anyways im having a problem when i run all of the 508-525 clients and some of the 317 clients it says main class erorr yadada anyways take a look…Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
anyways in most cases with most clients this happens. i need idea please. please help me. ive tried reinstalling my java, clearing all caches and reinstalling the clients. thats about all i know so please help.
